arts.ttl: Real Madrid vs Juventus: Confirmed Starting Lineup Announced For Champions League Clash
arts.sum: Jude Bellingham starts again, alongside Aurélien Tchouaméni and Arda Guler, the latter coming off the bench against Getafe to assist the winner. It means Fede Valverde starts at that position again, and also captains the team.

arts.ttl: Official: Real Madrid starting lineup against Juventus | UEFA Champions League
arts.sum: Real Madrid will square off against Juventus on Matchday 3 of the 2025/26 UEFA Champions League in under a couple of hours. With kickoff at the Santiago Bernabeu not far away, manager Xabi Alonso has announced the Real Madrid starting lineup that will take the field against the Serie A bigwigs.
